mapper.select: select ul_idx,ul_title,ul_nickname,ul_contents,ul_place,ul_cate,ul_likes,date_format(ul_create_date,'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') as ul_create_date,ul_hit_cnt from userlife order by ul_idx DESC
mapper.insert: insert into userlife(ul_title ,ul_nickname, ul_contents, ul_place, ul_create_date, ul_cate, ul_member_id) values(#{ulTitle},#{ulNickname},#{ulContents},#{ulPlace},now(),#{ulCate},#{ulMemberId})
mapper.update: UPDATE userlife SET ul_hit_cnt = ul_hit_cnt + 1 WHERE ul_idx = #{ulIdx};
UPDATE userlife SET ul_likes = ul_likes + 1 WHERE ul_idx=#{ulIdx}
mapper.select: select ul_likes from userlife where ul_idx=#{ulIdx}
